full_summary:
### Asset Retirement Obligations Consultant
#### Request for Proposal (DFN 22-010)

**[Publication Date]:** October 19, 2022  
**[Closing Date and Time]:** October 26, 2022, 13:00:00  
**[Contracting Authority]:** Marine Atlantic Inc.

**Background and Objective**
The Government of Canada invites [prequalified Suppliers] [eligible Suppliers] to submit their proposals for the Asset Retirement Obligations Consultant services under the PASS 6 Financial and Accounting Services against Supply Arrangement E60ZT-18TSPS/D.

**Description of Requirement**
Marine Atlantic Inc. requires a consultant to assist in the application of the new PSAB standard 3280 Asset Retirement Obligations. The successful candidate will review completed work to determine if it complies with the standard, assist in the development of financial statement notes and audit working papers and provide guidance on recommended assets to be identified as retirement obligations, and its fair values.

**Period of the Contract**
The contract is expected to commence on or before December 31, 2022, with an option to extend for a period of two months.

**Evaluation Process and Selection Methodology**
The evaluation process will consist of the following steps:

*   Mandatory Technical Criteria
*   Point-Rated Technical Criteria
*   Financial Evaluation (using a relative pricing formula)

The successful candidate will be selected based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. The ratio will be 70 % for the technical merit and 30 % for the price.

**Security Requirements**
The selected supplier will be required to hold a Security Clearance Level FSC - Confidential and may be required to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement prior to access to confidential information.

**Submission Requirements**

All proposals must be submitted electronically through [Insert platform or email] by the closing date and time.

Note to the Proposers:

*   A mandatory technical evaluation will be conducted to assess the candidate's experience and expertise.
*   Suppliers are required to have a pre-existing relationship with the Client.

Note to the Client:

*   Suppliers are required to undergo a pre-qualification process before submitting a proposal

**Basis of Issue:**

This Request for Proposal touches upon Canadian Federal Government (Marine Atlantic Inc.) official processes but involves a complex mix of laws and media policies.
